title: Anti-Mubārak banner on a lamppost
description: Photographer's description: Pictures taken during the Egyptian Revolution. Text in image: مستعد لعلاج مبارك من الزهايمر و فصام بارانويا - امضاء استشارى نفسية بالعباسية . Translation of Text in image: Willing to treat Mubārak for Alzheimer's and Paranoia- signed by a psychiatrist in Al ʻAbbāsīyah.
name: Mubārak, Muḥammad Ḥusnī, 1928-
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
